cbstats - CraftBukkit stats

cbstats is an abstraction for the different log files and settings files that a CraftBukkit installation creates.

It is capable of

  • Determining which users are online
  • Calculating the total online time for users
  • Returning configuration settings

Documentation

use

jwandborg@sophie:~$ python3
Python 3.1.3 (r313:86834, Nov 28 2010, 10:01:07)
[GCC 4.4.5] on linux2
Type "help", "copyright", "credits" or "license" for more information.
>>> import cbstats
>>> help(cbstats)

Install from PyPi

pip install cbstats

or

easy_install cbstats

Get the code

jwandborg/cbstats on GitHub, or

git clone git://github.com/jwandborg/cbstats
~ Joar Wandborg, http://wandborg.se
